title: Rengar nerfs
body:
i can't be the only frustrated rengar main over here. the q nerf they threw at us i have to agree with, but the e-bola nerf is complete crap i must say. he's so clunky to play, i barely play him anymore. plus the ability's aiming (when jumping) is delayed to when he's throwing it, not before the 0.25 delay. this means u have to KEEP your mouse on the target for a tad longer; super annoying. not fun to play him anymore to be honest.
thought??

replies.body: As an ADC main any Rengar nerfs are accepted by me C:
I disagree I been playing rangar and I can still 1 shot so he still fine
Yes I totally agree REMOVE THE DELAY ON E PLEASE

They added the delay because it was too OP, now that there is a minute delay, you all go about bitching?

Rito can't win. There are what, 130+ champions? And you expect them to get balancing right in an instant, please.
